section: 3. The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: This section outlines the purpose of the joint venture. However, the second sentence which states that this purpose can be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc. contradicts the fundamental principle of a joint venture, which implies mutual agreement and benefit. This gives BorrowMoney.com, inc. unilateral control over a critical aspect of the venture, potentially undermining JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's interests and expectations. This clause undermines the very essence of a JOINT venture.

section:
13. Each Member will be responsible for its respective duties as follows: 

Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The roles are not equal when it comes to responsibilites. BorrowMoney.com, inc is responsible for 'HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspects' whereas JVLS, LLC is responsible for 60k per month from Government contracts. There is a disparity and it could be seen as predatory.

section: 15. Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: This section outlines the capital contributions of each member. Assigning a value of $3,500,000.00 USD to '1,500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty*' contributed by BorrowMoney.com, inc. seems highly inflated and potentially unrealistic. This is unlikely to be a true market value. The same applies to the 60k from JVLS LLC and assigning it 3.5 million value. This is contradictory as these values seem fake.

section: 28. Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote, however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote.
explanation: This section details the voting power of each member. Giving BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote creates an imbalance of power and contradicts the idea of a joint venture where both parties ideally have equal influence. This undermines JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's ability to effectively participate in decision-making.

section: 29. This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This clause allows BorrowMoney.com, inc. to unilaterally amend the agreement, regardless of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's objections. This undermines the principles of a joint venture where both parties should have equal say in modifications to the agreement. It creates a power imbalance and gives BorrowMoney.com, inc. the ability to alter the terms of the agreement to their advantage, potentially harming JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's interests. This clause essentially renders JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go a passive participant in the agreement.

section: 60. This Venture is termed a contractual joint venture and will not constitute a partnership. Members will provide services to one another on an arms' length basis while remaining independent business entities. There will be no pooling of profits and losses. Each Member is responsible only for its own actions and no Member is an agent for any other Member. Members will not be jointly or severally liable for the actions of the other Members.
explanation: The section states the Venture does not constitute a partnership. However, a Joint Venture is a partnership, it is a short-term partnership and for a specific purpose, but it is still a form of partnership. The description is misaligned as the section is trying to imply they are not in a partnership at all.
